All Implemented Interfaces:
Loader, ContentProvider<I>, StructuredContentProvider<I,E>
public abstract class RemoteContentProvider<I,E>
extends BaseLoader<BaseLoadConfig>
implements StructuredContentProvider<I,E>

A IStructuredContentProvider implementation that supports the remote loading of data and paging.

getElements

public abstract void getElements(I input,
                                 AsyncContentCallback<E> callback)
Returns the elements to display in the viewer when its input is set to the given element. implementors must take input and come up with a call to callback.setElements

Specified by:
